title: Sherie Harkins on Art, Life and Meaning: The Fish, The Seagull and the Place of Vulnerability
description:
Sherie Harkins started an art discussion group after her discussion with Paul VanderKlay. Here, we catch up on what has happened with the group in the last six months. We also talk about the connections between Art, Math and Science.

We have a wide ranging talk about finding meaning in life, suffering and love.

https://sherieharkins.com
https://www.instagram.com/sherieharkins/

The video I told you about my son sent me is https://youtu.be/cUzklzVXJwo

Here's Sherie's first conversation with Paul VanderKlay. https://youtu.be/A4Q_gZYQcqs
